game.name: EigaScript: Script-Based Video/Audiobook Maker
game.genres: Indie, Audio Production, Utilities, Video Production, Web Publishing
game.shortDescription: EigaScript is a video-making tool, but you make a video or audiobook with a markup language, like HTML. Compose your scenes in sections. Add images and BGM, and type in the script to be narrated, which will be voiced over with built-in TTS engine with no limits of monthly use or fee!
